targets.expr: sum(rate({service_name="blog"} | json | user_agent =~ ".*Mobile.*|.*iPhone.*|.*Android.*" and user_agent !~ ".*bot.*|.*crawler.*" and path =~ "/blog/.*" [1h]))
sum(rate({service_name="blog"} | json | user_agent !~ ".*Mobile.*|.*iPhone.*|.*Android.*|.*bot.*|.*crawler.*" and user_agent != "" and path =~ "/blog/.*" [1h]))
sum(rate({service_name="blog"} | json | user_agent =~ ".*Mobile.*|.*iPhone.*|.*Android.*" and user_agent !~ ".*bot.*|.*crawler.*" and path = "/" [1h]))
sum(rate({service_name="blog"} | json | user_agent !~ ".*Mobile.*|.*iPhone.*|.*Android.*|.*bot.*|.*crawler.*" and user_agent != "" and path = "/" [1h]))
topk(10, sum by (path) (count_over_time({service_name="blog"} | json | user_agent = "" or user_agent = "unknown" [1h])))

panels.title: No User Agent Traffic - Top Paths

targets.expr: topk(5, sum by (remote_ip) (count_over_time({service_name="blog"} | json | user_agent = "" or user_agent = "unknown" [24h])))

panels.title: No User Agent Traffic - Top IPs

targets.expr: sum by (status) (count_over_time({service_name="blog"} | json | user_agent = "" or user_agent = "unknown" [24h]))

panels.title: No User Agent Traffic - Status Codes

targets.expr: topk(5, sum by (path) (count_over_time({service_name="blog"} | json | user_agent =~ ".*Chrome.*" and user_agent !~ ".*bot.*|.*crawler.*" and path =~ "/blog/.*" [24h])))
sum by (path) (count_over_time({service_name="blog"} | json | user_agent =~ ".*Chrome.*" and user_agent !~ ".*bot.*|.*crawler.*" and path =~ "/blog/.*" [1h]))
sum by (path) (count_over_time({service_name="blog"} | json | user_agent =~ ".*Safari.*" and user_agent !~ ".*Chrome.*|.*bot.*|.*crawler.*" and path =~ "/blog/.*" [1h]))
sum by (path) (count_over_time({service_name="blog"} | json | user_agent =~ ".*Firefox.*" and user_agent !~ ".*bot.*|.*crawler.*" and path =~ "/blog/.*" [1h]))
topk(10, sum by (country) (count_over_time({service_name="blog"} | json | country != "" and country != "Unknown" and user_agent !~ ".*bot.*|.*crawler.*|.*spider.*" [24h])))
sum by (country) (count_over_time({service_name="blog"} | json | country != "" and country != "Unknown" and user_agent !~ ".*bot.*|.*crawler.*" and path =~ "/blog/.*" [1h]))

topk(5, sum by (country_code) (count_over_time({service_name="blog"} | json | country_code != "" and country_code != "XX" and user_agent =~ ".*Mobile.*|.*iPhone.*|.*Android.*" and user_agent !~ ".*bot.*|.*crawler.*" [24h])))
sum by (country) (rate({service_name="blog"} | json | country != "" and country != "Unknown" and user_agent !~ ".*bot.*|.*crawler.*" and path =~ "/blog/.*" [1h]))

panels.title: Blog Post Views by Country Over Time

targets.expr: topk(5, sum by (country_code) (count_over_time({service_name="blog"} | json | country_code != "" and country_code != "XX" and user_agent !~ ".*Mobile.*|.*iPhone.*|.*Android.*|.*bot.*|.*crawler.*" and user_agent != "" [24h])))

title: Blog - User Behavior, User Agent & Geographic Analysis
